pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fits Cubic Bezier Spline Functions to Intertemporal and Risky Choice Data // Uses monotonically constrained Cubic Bezier Splines (CBS) to approximate latent utility functions in intertemporal choice and risky choice data. For more information, see Lee, Glaze, Bradlow, and Kable doi:10.1007/s11336-020-09723-4.
